title: Goblin Mode
itunes:title: Goblin Mode
description:
Chris talks to Juniper about the rise of Goblin Mode, our media ecosystem, misinformation, and how journalists' twitter addiction leaves them prey to far right media operations.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
